settings.heading: Dihydroberberine (100mg)
settings.description: When you eat bread or rice, your body has two choices: burn it for energy or store it as belly fat. This ingredient makes sure it goes to your muscles instead of your gut. It's 5x stronger than regular berberine.

settings.heading: Grains of Paradise (30mg)
settings.description: Your body has special fat cells that burn calories as heat. This ingredient turns them ON. It's like flipping a switch on fat-burning furnaces you didn't know you had. Studies show it melts belly fat specifically.

settings.heading: Lactobacillus Gasseri (10 Billion CFU)
settings.description: This good bacteria stops some of the fat you eat from being stored. Think of it like a bouncer - "Sorry, this fat isn't coming in." Clinical studies show guys lost inches off their waist in 12 weeks.

settings.heading: Bifidobacterium Breve  B-3 (100mg)
settings.description: Another good bacteria that helps burn fat. Works with the one above. Two bouncers are better than one. Studies show it reduces body fat percentage in overweight men.

settings.heading: Cayenne Pepper (120mg)
settings.description: Makes your body burn hotter. Like turning up the heat in your house. You burn more calories doing nothing. Also kills cravings naturally.

settings.heading: Ashwagandha (300mg)
settings.description: Lowers your stress hormone (cortisol) by 32%. High stress = high cortisol = belly fat. This fixes it. You're calmer, sleep better, and your body stops panic-storing fat. This is the KEY ingredient.

settings.heading: DIM (100mg)
settings.description: Gets rid of extra estrogen in your body. Too much estrogen makes men store fat like women do - in the belly. This cleans it out. More testosterone, less estrogen = less belly fat.

settings.heading: Zinc (15mg)
settings.description: Your body needs zinc to make testosterone. Low zinc = low testosterone = harder to lose fat. This fills the gap. Also helps your immune system.

settings.heading: Boron (6mg)
settings.description: Unlocks testosterone that's stuck in your body. You have testosterone, but it's "locked up" and useless. Boron frees it. More active testosterone = easier fat loss.

settings.heading: L-Theanine (80mg)
settings.description: Gives you smooth energy without jitters. You feel alert but calm. No anxiety, no crash later. Just steady energy all day.

settings.heading: Ashwagandha (300mg)
settings.description: Also helps here. Reduces fatigue, improves mental clarity, helps you handle stress without crashing. You're sharp all day, not foggy by 3 PM.

settings.heading: Saffron Extract (30mg)
settings.description: Stops emotional eating. When you're stressed or bored, you raid the kitchen. This makes that urge go away. You're not fighting cravings with willpower - they just disappear.

settings.heading: Cayenne Pepper (120mg)
settings.description: Promotes parasympathetic nervous system activation, supporting cognitive control over food choices during stress responses. Maintains focus without stimulatory side effects.

settings.heading: When will I notice results?

Week 3-6: Pants fitting looser, belly noticeably smaller

settings.heading: How is this different from fat burners?
settings.description: Fat burners use stimulants to artificially speed metabolism - you get jitters, crashes, and rebound when you stop. Dryft fixes the ROOT CAUSE (your hormones) so your body naturally stops storing belly fat. No stimulants. No crashes. No rebound.

settings.heading: Will I need to diet or go to the gym?
settings.description: No. This works even if you eat takeout and never work out. That said - if you eat better and move more, you'll see faster results. But Dryft works by fixing hormones, not forcing you to be perfect.

settings.heading: Is this safe? Can I take it with other supplements?
settings.description: Yes. All natural ingredients clinically studied for safety. No synthetic hormones, no banned substances. Check with your doctor if you take prescription medications or have existing health conditions.

settings.heading: What if it doesn't work for me?
settings.description: Email us within 90 days for a full refund. No questions. No forms. We only want your money if this actually works for you.

settings.heading: How is this different from testosterone boosters?
settings.description: Testosterone is only PART of the equation. Dryft addresses cortisol (stress hormone), estrogen (feminizing hormone), AND supports testosterone. Most "T-boosters" ignore the other hormones keeping you fat.
